ingredients.item: 2 x 200g cans essential Waitrose Tuna Steak in Spring Water, drained
400g can essential Waitrose Mixed Bean Salad, drained and rinsed
1 bunch essential Waitrose Salad Onions, chopped
2 tbsp essential Waitrose Extra Virgin Olive Oil
2 tbsp essential Waitrose White Wine Vinegar
Type HTML in the textarea above, and it will magically appear in the frame below.

instructions.step: Cook the rice in boiling water for 10 - 12 minutes, drain and rinse with warm water. Stir in the tuna, beans and onions.
Whisk together the oil and vinegar, season well and stir into the rice mixture. Serve immediately.
